attributes.action: Expansion of the UK Border Force
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to re-assign the armed forces personnel who are being made redundant due to government cuts or have been injured in the line of duty to be transferred to become part of an enlarged UK border force whose objective would to patrol and manage non airport entry points into the UK - Eurostar terminals, ferry and container ports, local airfields and costal harbours to take the UK's border controls to the standards of those demonstrated by the islands of Australia and New Zealand.
